lead_paragraph: Ethiopia's Kenenisa Bekele narrowly missed out on a new world record when he out-sprinted Kenya's Wilson Kipsang to win the Berlin marathon in the second fastest race of all time on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Bekele Claims Berlin Win in Near Record Time
headline.main: Bekele Claims Berlin Win in Near Record Time

snippet: Ethiopia's Kenenisa Bekele narrowly missed out on a new world record when he out-sprinted Kenya's Wilson Kipsang to win the Berlin marathon in the second fastest race of all time on Sunday....
